pages.text: $(li)The Hourglass can be filled with any kind Sand, Redstone Powder, Slime, or Honey.

$(li)Once filled, the material inside will slowly start falling with a time depends of the material used.$(br)$(li)Hourglass can be resetted by rotating twice with a $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/turn_table)Turn Table$(/l) or by shift clicking of it.$(br)$(li)You can recover the item placed in the Hourglass, right clicking on it.
$(li)You can place a Comparator next to a Hourglass. The strong of this redstone signal depends of the remaining time of the Hourglass.

$(l)Material time list$()$(br)$(li)Sugar: 40 ticks $(li)Sand: 70 ticks $(li)Concrete: 105 ticks $(li)Glowstone: 190 ticks $(li)Blaze Powder: 277 ticks  $(li)Redstone: 400 ticks $(li)Slime: 1750 ticks $(li)Honey 2000 ticks
